question:
Which of the following Vitamins of the ‘B-Complex’ are correctly paired with their respective names:
1.Vitamin B2-Riboflavin
2.Vitamin B3-Niacin
3.Vitamin B7-Biotin
4.Vitamin B12-Cyanocobalamine
explanation: Vitamin B complex consists of 8 different types of vitamins. B-1 (thiamine), B-2 (riboflavin), B-3 (niacin), B-5 (pantothenic acid), B-6 (pyridoxine), B-7 (biotin), B-9 (folic acid), and B-12 (cobalamin).
